questions.question: Which statement accurately describes unique aspects of machine learning workflows compared to traditional software development?
options: ML models can be deployed to production like any other type of software.
ML introduces extra steps like data prep, training, versioning, and monitoring that require adapted best practices.
ML models behave like traditional software and require standard DevOps tooling.
ML models can persist without ongoing management because the models are static.
correct_answers: ML introduces extra steps like data prep, training, versioning, and monitoring that require adapted best practices.
